statements: SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Trends;
SELECT Facility_ID, Water_Usage_Gallons FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT Facility_ID, Flow_Rate_GPM FROM Water_Usage_Trends ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Water_Usage_Gallons > 1000;
SELECT Facility_ID, Date, Water_Usage_Gallons, Flow_Rate_GPM FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Facility_ID = 101 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT Facility_ID, Water_Usage_Gallons FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Water_Usage_Gallons > 1000 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT Facility_ID, SUM(Water_Usage_Gallons) AS Total_Usage FROM Water_Usage_Trends GROUP BY Facility_ID HAVING Total_Usage > 5000;
SELECT AVG(Flow_Rate_GPM) AS Avg_Flow_Rate, MAX(Flow_Rate_GPM) AS Max_Flow_Rate FROM Water_Usage_Trends;
SELECT Facility_ID, Date, Water_Usage_Gallons, Flow_Rate_GPM FROM Water_Usage_Trends WHERE Facility_ID IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY Facility_ID, Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage;
SELECT facility_id, consumption_amount FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage WHERE consumption_amount > 100;
SELECT timestamp, facility_id FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM water_usage_trends WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage JOIN water_usage_trends ON manufacturing_facility_water_usage.facility_id = water_usage_trends.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage
SELECT facility_id, consumption_amount FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage WHERE consumption_amount > 100
SELECT facility_id, MAX(consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage GROUP BY facility_id
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT facility_id, AVG(consumption_amount) AS avg_consumption FROM manufacturing_facility_water_usage JOIN water_usage_trends ON manufacturing_facility_water_usage.facility_id = water_usage_trends.facility_id
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Location = 'City A';
SELECT Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Location, Consumption, Date FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY Consumption DESC;
SELECT ID, Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Consumption > 100 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT EquipmentName, LastMaintenance FROM FacilityEquipment WHERE LastMaintenance < '2022-05-01';
SELECT Location, Consumption, Date FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Consumption > 100 ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT EquipmentName, Location FROM FacilityEquipment WHERE LastMaintenance BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MonthYear, AverageUsage, PeakUsage FROM MonthlyUsageTrends WHERE AverageUsage > 500 ORDER BY PeakUsage DESC;
SELECT * FROM FacilityEquipment WHERE Location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago');
SELECT TrendID, MonthYear FROM MonthlyUsageTrends WHERE MonthYear LIKE '%-07';
SELECT * FROM Facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facility;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM Facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeter WHERE meter_reading > 100;
SELECT meter_id, meter_reading, DATE_FORMAT(timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d') AS recorded_date FROM WaterMeter ORDER BY meter_reading DESC;
SELECT * FROM Facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeter WHERE meter_reading > 100 ORDER BY meter_reading ASC;
SELECT facility_name, meter_reading FROM Facility JOIN WaterMeter ON Facility.facility_id = WaterMeter.facility_id WHERE meter_reading < 50;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM Alert JOIN WaterMeter ON Alert.meter_id = WaterMeter.meter_id ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE area_name = 'Warehouse';
SELECT area_name, consumption_gallon FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY consumption_gallon DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, production_rate FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE production_rate > 100;
SELECT area_name, SUM(usage_gallon) AS total_usage FROM WaterUsageHistory GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT area_name, consumption_gallon FROM WaterConsumption WHERE consumption_gallon > 100 ORDER BY consumption_gallon DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY production_rate;
SELECT id, area_name, usage_gallon, timestamp FROM WaterUsageHistory WHERE area_name LIKE '%Production%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_name, location, status FROM MachineDetails WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY location, machine_name;

SELECT MachineDetails.machine_name, MaintenanceLogs.description, MaintenanceLogs.log_date FROM MachineDetails INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON MachineDetails.id = MaintenanceLogs.machine_id ORDER BY MaintenanceLogs.log_date DESC;
